titleStmt.title: Saint Stevens last will and testament A funerall sermon on Acts 7. ver. 59. preached at the enterrement of the remaines of Mris Joice Featly. Together with the testimonie then given unto her by Tho. Gataker, B. of D. and rector of Rotherhith.
titleStmt.author: Gataker, Thomas, 1574-1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E[lizabeth] P[urslowe] for Nicolas Bourne, and are to be sold at his shop at the south entrance of the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: The first edition printed in this format.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the south entrance of the Royall Exchange
